content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 4, Sunderland 1.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 4, Sunderland 1.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Sebastián Coates.
Attempt missed. Sebastián Coates (Sunderland) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Jordi Gómez with a cross following a set piece situation.
Foul by Martín Demichelis (Manchester City).
Jeremain Lens (Sunderland) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt saved. Wilfried Bony (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne.
Offside, Sunderland. Sebastián Coates tries a through ball, but Duncan Watmore is caught offside.
Offside, Manchester City. Kevin De Bruyne tries a through ball, but Raheem Sterling is caught offside.
Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lee Cattermole (Sunderland).
Attempt missed. Wilfried Bony (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high.
Attempt saved. Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Raheem Sterling.
Fabian Delph (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lee Cattermole (Sunderland).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match John O'Shea (Sunderland) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. David Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne.
Attempt missed. Sebastián Coates (Sunderland) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Adam Johnson with a cross following a set piece situation.
Jeremain Lens (Sunderland) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Eliaquim Mangala (Manchester City).
Substitution, Sunderland. Duncan Watmore replaces Danny Graham.
Substitution, Manchester City. Martín Demichelis replaces Vincent Kompany because of an injury.
Danny Graham (Sunderland) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City).
Penalty missed! Bad penalty by Wilfried Bony (Manchester City) right footed shot is too high. Wilfried Bony should be disappointed.
Penalty conceded by Sebastián Coates (Sunderland) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Manchester City. David Silva draws a foul in the penalty area.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Billy Jones.
Foul by John O'Shea (Sunderland).
Wilfried Bony (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Sunderland. Jeremain Lens replaces Steven Fletcher.
Substitution, Manchester City. Fabian Delph replaces Yaya Touré.
Substitution, Manchester City. Vincent Kompany replaces Nicolás Otamendi.
Adam Johnson (Sunderland) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by David Silva (Manchester City).
Foul by Lee Cattermole (Sunderland).
Yaya Touré (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Manchester City 4, Sunderland 1. Fabio Borini (Sunderland) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the bottom left corner following a corner.
Attempt saved. Fabio Borini (Sunderland) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Lee Cattermole.
Attempt missed. Lee Cattermole (Sunderland) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left following a corner.
Corner,  Sunderland. Conceded by Aleksandar Kolarov.
Substitution, Sunderland. Lee Cattermole replaces Yann M'Vila.
Goal!  Manchester City 4, Sunderland 0. Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner.
Attempt blocked. Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Billy Jones.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Vito Mannone.
Attempt saved. David Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne.
Offside, Manchester City. David Silva tries a through ball, but Wilfried Bony is caught offside.
Second Half begins Manchester City 3, Sunderland 0.
First Half ends, Manchester City 3, Sunderland 0.
